post.description: Transforms a JSON payload from the Logical Data Model into a destination format.

parameters.name: Transform Request Structure
parameters.description: A JSON payload containing destination system and entity, as well as the structure itself to transform.

parameters.name: Debug-Option
parameters.description: Set to "Output-Xml" to be able to request a copy of the JSON after it has been converted to XML.

200.description: The transform operation was a success.

400.description: Could not parse the transform request - please check the structure.

404.description: Could not find a transform for the specified system name and entity.

500.description: An unexpected error has occurred - please get in touch with us so we can check our logs!

501.description: An XSLT was found for the given system name and entity - and the XML of the XSLT was well-formed, but there was an error with the content of the XSLT itself.
